sentences.en: Bruce Wyatt will be the guest speaker at next month's meeting.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯·怀亚特将成为下月会议的特邀发言人。

sentences.en: Clapping drowned the speaker's words for a moment.
sentences.cn: 鼓掌声一度淹没了发言人的声音。

sentences.en: Everyone felt that the speaker's remarks hit close to home.
sentences.cn: 大家都感觉到发言人的话击中了要害.

sentences.en: He inclined towards the speaker to hear more clearly.
sentences.cn: 他把身体倾向发言人,以便听得更清楚些.

sentences.en: He is a fluent speaker of Hebrew.
sentences.cn: 他说一口流利的希伯来语。

sentences.en: He is a very witty speaker.
I should like to echo the words of the previous speaker.
sentences.cn: 我想重复前面一位发言者的话.

sentences.en: Mr. Speaker, our message to the president is simple.
sentences.cn: 议长先生，我们向总统表达的意思非常简单。

sentences.en: Pay attention to the body language of the speaker.
sentences.cn: 注意说话者的肢体语言。

sentences.en: Some English words are difficult for speakers of other languages. ＃
sentences.cn: 一些英语单词对说其他语言的人来说是很难的。

sentences.en: The keynote speaker (= main or most important speaker ) was Robert Venturi, the architect.
sentences.cn: 主要发言人是建筑师罗伯特·文图里。

sentences.en: The shakes of the speaker's hands betrayed his nervousness.
sentences.cn: 发言者双手颤抖,可见他很紧张.

sentences.en: The speaker strung together a series of jokes.
sentences.cn: 演说者讲了一连串的笑话。

sentences.en: The speaker was received with a mixture of applause and hisses.
sentences.cn: 那演说者同时得到喝彩声和嘘声.

sentences.en: There was a little cluster of admirers round the guest speaker.
sentences.cn: 有一小群仰慕者围着那位特邀嘉宾.

sentences.en: They've found out where the other speaker plugs in.
sentences.cn: 他们已找到另外那个扬声器的连接点了。

sentences.en: We mustn't catch the speaker up by so many questions.
sentences.cn: 我们不该用这么多问题来打断发言人.
